players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Charlie? That seems odd since Charlie was killed."
Bob: "I investigated Alice because I suspected her from the start. Charlie's death confirms my choice - mafia wouldn't kill their own."
Diana: "I'm voting for Alice. Bob's claim as detective and investigation result seems credible given the circumstances."
